boardgame.name: Karciane Podziemia
One Deck Dungeon
Winziges Verlies
迷你地下城
boardgame.description: One Deck Dungeon is a card game _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;roguelike_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; a dungeon delve that is different every time, difficult to survive, with a character you build up from scratch. The deck consists of various foes to combat and other perils from the dungeon. Each card, though, depicts both the obstacle to overcome and the potential rewards for doing so. When you defeat a card, you claim it as either experience, an item, or a skill, tucking it under the appropriate side of your character card to show its benefits._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The longer you take exploring the dungeon, the deeper you'll delve, and the difficulty will scale up quickly! If you make it far enough, you'll have to fight the dungeon boss. Survive, and you'll be a legend!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One Deck Dungeon is designed for 1-2 players. With multiple sets, you can add more players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Due to continuing storage problems, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m regularly selling (least-played) games from my personal collection. I did like all the games I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling , but with 200+ board and card games there are always other (comparable) contenders that just speak to me more. And besides, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m a real collector, always trying to perfect my collection with games I only like best (at that moment in time). The low pricing, therefore, is simple (if you were wondering): I just want to make other people happy for a few bucks/euros. Enabling me to purchase a new game every four or five orders. This game - One Deck Dungeon - has been unwrapped, opened, and only played once. Basically, this means that the condition of the game is _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;new_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;. I do take good care of my games :) ... Shipping from The Netherlands, Utrecht (PostNL or Kiala). So, before placing your order, please ask me for a shipping and packaging cost estimate first! Thank you for visiting and do check out the other games I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling: https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/user/gideongrim ...

I have like new copies of One Deck Dungeon, and its second standalone expansion, Forest of Shadows for sale in a well-priced bundle! These games are great, rolling handfuls and handfuls of small, colorful dice to take on the dungeon and its baddies, and the developer is constantly releasing free to play, printable expansion bosses and player characters to broaden this beautiful game! As an added bonus, the cards are also already sleeved, if that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s something that appeals to you. Here for the first buyer! Enjoy!
